verbose_text: Its physiological electron donor has not been unequivocally identified, but in many SRP and SOB the aprAB genes are part of a sat-aprBA-qmoABC gene cluster, which together with other indirect evidence led to the general conviction that QmoABC is the missing electron donor to AprAB, linking the quinone pool to sulfate reduction.
